verses.name: 2 Chronicles 13:13
verses.text: But Jeroboam caused an ambushment to come about behind them: so they were before Judah, and the ambushment was behind them.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 13:14
verses.text: And when Judah looked back, behold, the battle was before and behind: and they cried unto the Lord, and the priests sounded with the trumpets.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 13:15
verses.text: Then the men of Judah gave a shout: and as the men of Judah shouted, it came to pass, that God smote Jeroboam and all Israel before Abijah and Judah.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 13:16
verses.text: And the children of Israel fled before Judah: and God delivered them into their hand.
